title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted runner that downloads, caches, and serves GGUF models via a REST+CLI interface.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async helpers for chatting with Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; published on npm.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter providing Ollama LLM & embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured chat WebUI (Open-WebUI) that proxies to any local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Community npm CLI for interactive chats, model pulls, and bulk benchmarking.

title: Ollama4j – Java client
summary: Lightweight Java/Kotlin SDK wrapping Ollama’s REST endpoints.

title: ollama-rs – Rust client
summary: Async Rust crate for chatting, pulling, and deleting models on Ollama.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Curated recipes: LangChain, LlamaIndex, Docker-Compose, GPU, and more.

title: chainlit + Ollama starter
summary: One-click template for building Chainlit chat UIs backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers query local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui (Electron)
summary: Cross-platform desktop wrapper around Ollama built with Electron and React.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module that spins up Ollama containers for testing LLM pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-qa (LlamaIndex)
summary: Minimal LlamaIndex app that ingests PDFs and answers questions via local Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt.js Slack bot that threads replies using Ollama models.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS micro-service starter with built-in Ollama client and Swagger docs.

title: ollama-rust-server
summary: Experimental Axum web server exposing Ollama endpoints in pure Rust.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go SDK with context cancellation and streaming for Ollama.
